author: Confucius
message: Fine words and an insinuating appearance are seldom associated with true virtue
title: Thought of the day

author: Oliver Holmes
message: We do not quit playing because we grow old, we grow old because we quit playing.
title: Thought of the day

author: Wayne Dyer
message: You can't choose up sides on a round world.
title: Thought of the day

author: Thornton Wilder
message: My advice to you is not to inquire why or whither, but just enjoy your ice cream while its on your plate, that's my philosophy.
title: Thought of the day
